column1: Roșiorii de Vede (Romanian pronunciation: [roʃiˌorij de ˈvede]; sometimes Roșiori de Vede or
column3: Rușii de Vede) is a city in Teleorman County
column4: Romania. Located in the Muntenia region
column5: it is one of the oldest cities in the country. It was first mentioned in a document which dates back to 1385
column6: when the city was visited by two German pilgrims who were returning from Jerusalem and stopped for a few days in a town they called Russenart.Several Romanian personalities were born in and around the city
